You couldn't help but be jealous of her.

Sonia, she's always treated like the princess. First being pampered by my parents and now it seems like even the supernatural loves her! What makes her so special anyway? I'm twice the woman she is!

Realizing how you just acted, you shook your head furiously. It's only been ten minutes and you're already beginning to act more feminine. You had to hurry and find your sister before it gets worse!

Easier said than done however. Mia's house is a couple blocks down the road. And while it really wouldn't take you too long to reach there by foot, you couldn't help but feel a little uneasy as you walked along the sidewalk. As a man it wasn't a big deal, but as a woman your petite and obviously weaker body couldn't necessarily take on someone twice your size. And given the sensual nature of your costume...well, it wouldn't be surprising if it didn't attract the more "aggressive" members of the male persuasion. And the further away you were from home you were the more uncomfortable you seemed to be.

Suddenly you came to a stop as you heard your name called. "Candice!"

The familiarity of his voice sent your legs trembling. It was David, and it seemed as if he caught up with you.

"You seem to be deep in thought," he began. "You're walking slow."

The feelings you were getting before were flaring up once again. Seeing him set your heart a flutter. Your body was giving you mixed signals as your mind kept from totally jumping all over him.

"Y-yeah," you nervously answered.

"You care to talk about it?" he asked.

There wasn't any doubt in your mind at this point you were in love with him. The love once reserved for Sophia now belonged solely to him and only him. You could feel it within the moistness of your loins. It wouldn't be long until you wouldn't be able to control yourself any longer. Sometimes it just might be easier if you just give in...
1121122111211111212212222112212111112221.title: Search outside.

choices: Climb the tree and go through the window to Mia's room.
1121122111211111212212222112212111112221.content:
It's been a few miles and your feet was starting to get sore. Luckily there was a park bench nearby. David and you decided it would be best if you stopped here and rest.

"You know," he began, "You still haven't told me where exactly it is you're going."

"Just to a friends," you lied. But honestly at this point you didn't even know what exactly you were searching for. Your mind was so cloudy, struggling between finding your little sister, or having a little make out session with the dreamy boy sitting right next to you.

"I don't know what it is with you," he claimed.

"What do you mean?" you wondered, curious by that statement.

"Well," he began, "It's funny. It's like we've never met before, but yet I've known you all my life, you know?"

If only you knew, you thought to myself.

"Is that strange?" he asked. "I mean, just the energy I feel when I'm around you. It's like we're connected in some way. It feels so natural...so right. It's like telling us we were meant to be together."

You were speechless. Not because of the powerful language he was using, but because deep down you felt it too.

"Candice, I..." he paused, "I've never felt this way about a girl before in my entire life. You're the most beautiful lady I've ever seen, and I truly want to be with you. I love you."

All the barriers went down, melted like butter. Whatever deliberations that were going on in your head was suddenly replaced with impulse as you violently pressed you lips unto his and kissed him. This time there was no bet, no little game that told you you had to do this. This was on you, entirely, and you gladly gave it to him.

You put my hand up over his lap as he slowly made his hand closer to your breast. Totally defenseless you gave him the go ahead to touch it as you leaned back with him on top of you. You closed your eyes, trying to take in every feeling that was overtaking you. You felt his love washing over you. If it wasn't such a public space you would consider taking it one step further. Perhaps you should take this to a more intimate location...

What are you doing!? you could hear a voice yelling from inside your brain. Did you forget about Sophia!?

The voice stopped you in your tracks. What were you thinking?

You turned your face away as you struggled to get him off of you. Seeing you were bother, he immediately released you as you scurried up to your feet.

"What's wrong?" he asked in a panic.

With tears in your eyes, you could barely get out the words. "I'm sorry." Quickly you turned and ran away as fast as you could. You didn't want to do it. The truth was you truly loved him. In another life you would gladly spend the rest of your life with him. But fate dealt you a different hand, a hand that whether you wanted to or not, you had to live. After all, you still have Sophia, and even though any transgression you made with David could technically be blamed on her, you still couldn't help but feel as if you betrayed her in some way. Even if it hurts, you had to move onward.



Eventually you made it to Mia's house, and not a moment too soon. With all the emotions swirling around in your head it was getting harder and harder to justify what you just did. Still as long as you could focus on your goal you could remember Raven was still within you.

Unfortunately while David and you were engaged in a bout of tonsil hockey Mia most likely had returned home, making sneaking into her house that much more difficult. Still, you had to find a way in, no matter which way you'd do it.
1121122111211111212212222112212111112221.title: Resist, you need to find Sonia as soon as possi...

1121122111211111212212222112212111112222.content:
Finally getting into the spirit of things, as Janice and Sonia had hoped, you began to mingle with the crowd, holding conversations with everyone, especially with David. You did not know why you had a growing attachment to him but you decided to go with it to keep your mind distracted.

"She's finally starting to relax into her new role." said Janice, quietly. "If all goes well, the demon half of Raven will be destroyed completely and be filled by his other half, a warlock."

Sonia sighed. "I just hope 'Candice' doesn't relax too much and becomes a witch." she said. "I would miss my brother."

"At least 'she' would still be your sibling." replied Janice quietly. "If the demon half takes over before this night is done, we will lose him completely and will have no choice but to hand him over to Ookami Youkai."

Sonia swallowed hard. "I hope your plan works, Janice." she whispered, tears forming. "I sensed the demon within him, its strong and I doubt it will leave my brother quietly."

"Witchcraft is stronger, Sonia." said Janice. "The more comfortable Raven gets with the magic, keeping him Candice, the greater his chances are of escaping his horrible fate."

The two fell silent and put on happy faces as you passed, giggling with David leading you to the center of the living room to dance to the music. "I wonder where the birthday boy is." said David, to you. "One would think he would attend his own birthday party."

You grinned. "Oh, he's here." you said, honestly. "The theme of his party is, who's Raven." you giggled. "He is in this house, disguised as a party guest. Everyone has one chance to guess who Raven is."

David laughed. "That sounds like Sophia's type of game." he said. "Was this her idea?"

You shrugged. "Maybe." you replied. "I don't know her that well."

David shrugged it off, unsuspecting, you inwardly found it amusing. "He doesn't have a clue!" you thought. "This could be a lot of fun after all!"

You soon excused yourself from David and began to talk to the other guests and the theme of 'Who's Raven' began to quickly spread and people began to talk about their guesses of who Raven was pretending to be. In the process, you became the life of the party, 'getting to know Raven's friends', all of whom had no idea you were Candice.

"I'm really beginning to see the fun part of this, guys." you whispered carefully to Sonia and Janice. "No one has a single clue, this Halloween costume is perfect."

"We're glad you're liking it, 'Candice'." said Janice with a smile. "It's coming close to midnight, we will have to take the headband off and reveal your identity soon."

You looked at the clock and frowned, you were having so much fun at your party that you lost track of time. "Yeah, I guess so." you said, halfhearted. "I was beginning to like being your sister."

"That's the hormones talking." replied Janice. "I would not be a very good friend if I did not turn you back to normal, as promised and give your guests a good shock." she paused, hiding the hope in her eyes. "However, if you really want to stay a girl the rest of your life..."

Again, you look up a the clock, you have two minutes to decide.

What do you do....?
1121122111211111212212222112212111112222.title: Life of the party.

1121122111211111212212222112212111112222.content:
Again, you look up at the clock, you have two minutes to decide but, inwardly, you have already made your final decision. You turned to Janice and smiled shyly. "I have always felt out of sorts, as Raven." you said. "I don't know why, it was as if I was not me, somehow."

"That's the demon within you." thought Janice. then she asked, "What are you trying to say?"

"I was furious with you guys, at first, turning me into a girl and making me do girlish things." you continued. "Only, now, I don't know where to begin thanking you." you sighed. "Every new experience is frightening and disorienting but ultimately rewarding as if I am discovering something about myself."

"One minute." said Sonia.

You closed your eyes then opened them. "I want you to reveal my identity to the party, to make good on your promise." you said. Janice's eyes began to water then overflowed as you then added, "Then announce that I will be Candice from now on."

Janice gave you a warm hug, as did Sonia. "You're new life begins now." said Janice.

"Attention, everyone!" said Sonia, loudly. "It's time to reveal who Raven is!"

Janice removed the headband and you returned to normal, but still wearing the fairy costume. Everyone gasped, realizing that who you were, then roared into laughter as you looked ridiculous in your revealing costume. But, before things got too uncomfortable, Sonia called for silence.

"Raven went through all of this for one reason, he wishes to remain female for the rest of her life." said Janice. "He had always felt empty and alone but this experience had changed all of that."

With that said, Janice then placed the headband back onto your head and you returned to being female. Only, as she did, you heard a faint voice within your mind... "This is not over... you will be mine!"

You shuddered slightly at the faint voice. "What was that?" you thought.

"Welcome to womanhood, Candice." said Sonia. "You are going to love your new life."
1121122111211111212212222112212111112222.title: Remain a girl... forever.

1121122111211111212212222112212111112222.content:
You smiled then turned to your guests, expecting various reactions from disgust to happiness but, to your surprise, they all seemed happy for you. "Sonia told me how empty you always seemed to be, Candice." said Sophia, hugging you. "That is why we did this, to give you a choice." the she thought "And a chance."

"I would have never guessed you were Raven... Candice." said David, blushing as Sophia released you. "You look good as a girl."

"You... you're not angry with me?" you asked.

"Not as long as Sophia isn't mad for stealing you away." said David, slowly smiling.

"Our magic can alter reality slightly." whispered Sonia carefully. "Everyone is happy for you but we influenced them to see choosing one's gender as a common place event."

"I'm not mad at all." said Sophia giggling. "In fact, I'm the one who introduced Candice to you, remember?"

David chuckled then pulled you in for a kiss to which everyone cheered. "You two were best friends since kindergarten." said David's twin sister, Emily, walking up to the group. "It's only fitting that you two hook up." she smiled. You can play tongue tag with her later, bro, let Candice open her gifts."

David gave you one last kiss on the lips hen released you as Emily and Janice took your wrists and dragged you to the presents. "Open mine first, Candice." urged Janice.

"No mine." pressed Emily.

"He's opening the present from me first, and that's final." said mom, entering the room. "It's a tradition in this household." she then turned to you. "Go on, Candice, open your gift from the family."

You smiled as Janice and Emily reluctantly released you and unwrapped the large gift from mom and your sister. It was...
1121122111211111212212222112212111112222.title: Opening your presents.

1121122111211111212212222112212111112222.content:
Your eyes grew wide, seeing a free standing wardrobe under the wrapping. Curious, you opened the two door to find it partially stocked with a small wardrobe of girls' clothing in your size, including panties, bras, tights, and other essentials. You turned to mom, who smiled. "Somehow I knew you would chose to remain my daughter, Candice. " she said, gently. "The wardrobe is only partial because I did not want to deny you your first shopping experience."

You did not know how to react to that so you just gave mom a polite smile. "Thank you, it's great." you said.

"This is just the beginning." said mom, giggling. "You have a lot to learn, just to be a girl, let alone your magical training. We'll talk about it more after the party."

You nodded and unwrapped the other presents. Janice had given you a huge makeup kit and an array of perfumes while Emily had given you your first magic book. Tearing up, you rubbed your hand across the cover. "One life ends and a new one begins." you muttered.

"No, your life has not ended." said mom, looking at you. "It has merely entered a new chapter." she smiled. "One that I'm sure will be very interesting."

Janice and Emily giggled. "We can't wait to teach you magic." they whispered.

A small smile formed onto your face.
1121122111211111212212222112212111112222.title: This is just the beginning...

1121122111211111212212222112212111112222.content:
The party was a great success with games, laughter, and good wishes for your new life. Once the party ended, mom took you to your room for one final surprise. "Okay, Candice... open your eyes." she said.

You opened your eyes to find that your room had been changed to suit a teenage girl with pastel pink walls, a white canopy bed, dresser, and of course a vanity. "It- It's beautiful." you said, smiling. "Thanks, mom."

Mom giggled. "The party to celebrate your birthday is over but the party to celebrate your training in magic has just begun." she said, mischievously. "Your sister went through this as well."

"It was a lot of fun." smiling, Sonia said.

"You have magic too?" surprised, you asked.

Sonia nodded. "I was not allowed to tell you unless you agreed to remain female." she said. blushing. "Are you ready to play magic tag?"

"How do you play?" you asked.

Mom smiled. "You have to learn how to use your magic fast to tag Sonia back or she will change your clothing into ridiculous combinations with me taking a picture of each one for the scrapbook." she said. "It starts... now!" she laughed as you gasped then ducked, sensing something coming your way. "As magic was used against you, it becomes easy to detect it but not easy to dodge."

You looked down and screamed, seeing you were now wearing the revealing fairy costume again before mom took a picture, the game had begun...
1121122111211111212212222112212111112222.title: the party continues.

1121122111211111212212222112212111112222.content:
"How do I use magic?" turning to mom, you asked. "I'm new to all of this!"

"There is no book explaining how it works, Candice." smiling, mom replied. "The reason for that is simple, no one wants magic to fall into the wrong hands."

"Can you at least give me a hint?" seeing your clothing change into a hot pink bikini, you asked. "Come on, I've gotten the short end of the stick thus far!"

Mom giggled. "First, you need to relax." after taking a picture, she replied. "Magic will not come to you if you are all stressed out like that."

You took a deep breath, despite the fact it cost you a picture wearing a wedding dress. Once you had calmed yourself down, you sensed magic coming at you again and managed to dodge it. Only, being distracted by the game, mom got hit and you giggled, seeing her in a little girl's dress, made to fit her size.

"Sorry, mom." trying not to giggle, Sonia said.

Mom giggled herself then returned her clothing to normal. "It just proves that Candice has learned to dodge magic spells." smiling, she said. "She still has not tagged you back yet so the game continues."

After a few failed attempts, you finally managed to cast a spell on Sonia. She screamed then giggled, seeing herself wearing the revealing fairy costume she had you wear to your birthday party. "Nice one, sis." grinning, she said. "I knew you'd get me back for that costume eventually."

"Now we're even." grinning back, you said. "What now?"

"Now we measure the power of your magic." walking up to you, mom said. "Hold still, please."

With that, mom placed a light hand onto your head and looked deep into your eyes. This made you nervous but, for some strange reason, it made you feel safe at the same time. After a long moment, mom took her hand off your head and stepped back, smiling. "Well, this is a surprise." smiling, she said.

"What did you see, mom." curious, Sonia asked.

Mom giggled. "Well, it turns out we really didn't have to do anything to Raven to ignite his magical power." looking at you, she said. "Her power is almost as strong as mine, meaning he would have become a girl and a witch the instant he turned 15, ten minutes before the party was scheduled."

Your jaw dropped. "You mean I was going to be a girl no matter what?" stunned, you asked. "What of that... strange voice in my head?"

"That, Candice, was a power from your father's side of the family." suddenly sad, mom replied. "You see, he was a demon but one who chose to fight his destiny and earn his right to become an angel."

"Did he... succeed?" hoping, I asked.

Mom nodded, tears forming. "He became an angel just as he died, defending me from his own father." sadly, she said. "He is now among the angels but my fear was of you as demon power was in your blood." she sighed, smiling again. "Fortunately, you chose your own destiny and are now a witch like me and your sisters, I'm proud of you."

You smiled.

121112122.content:
"Sometimes I wish you weren't such a hot headed guy." It was just an innocent thought, more of a joke than anything else, but the consequences would be very real for you.

You had walked over to the table and were reaching in to grab a candy, they looked quite good, all round and soft, and in a variety of bright attention grabbing colors. Your arm extends as you reach into the jar, but oddly it doesn't seem to get any closer. You stretch your arm faster, but it still doesn't reach. In fact, your arm is locked but still way off from the jar. Even more alarming is the fact that you can no longer see over the jar.

"Did it just grow?" You ask yourself confused. You take a step back and look around, it's not just the jar that has grown, but the whole room. The chairs around the table suddenly tower over you, the ceiling above has risen by one or two feet, and the whole floor seems to have spread out and taken the walls with it. The floor creeks slightly, you can hear footsteps on the soft carpet from behind.

"Oh hey little sis, big day! Can't reach your candies? Let me get them." Your now taller sister glides by and pick up the jar from the table. She turns to you with a cheery face and lowers the candies so you can reach.

"Here you go Rena."

"Thanks." You whisper back, then run with the jar into your room. The whole house is cavernous, it seems like everything has tripled in size. As you make your way, you notice how tall your little sister was, and what she called you.

"Did she say Rena?" Your voice sounds a little high, but you spoke too quietly to really notice. When you find your door, a plain wooden one as it has always been, you knock it open and then close it behind you. You then turn, and the sight of your room causes you to drop the jar of candies. There is a slight resemblance to your old room, but a number of details stand out. Your toy cars have all been replaced with stuffed animals; they fill your shelves and lay on your desk and bed. The pile of comics sitting in the corner has become fashion and beauty magazines, and the pants and shirts strung across the floor are now skirts, dresses and even, a training bra.

"Where did all of this come form?" Your new voice stands out with your loud shriek, and you cover your mouth with one hand. You spy a mirror sitting on your desk and rush over. The cheap little mirror creeks as you turn it with your hands. Brown hair is the first thing that comes into view, but unlike your hair, it is very fine and long. The mirror continues to turn. Your blue eyes are reflected back, but they are not the same, in fact the face you see is not your own, even though it cannot be anyone else's. You put your hands to your face hoping the mirror does not do the same, but you already know that it will; and it does.

There is no dodging the fact, you have become a girl hardly past 10 years of age. With a few dizzy steps, you retreat from the mirror, and you see more of your reformed body. You are thin and delicate, your long hair shimmers brightly as it flows over your shoulders and down your back. Your clothes are fitting for a girl such as yourself, you wear a pink skirt that flares down to your knees, while long white socks cover your legs. You have a long sleeved purple top, a bracelet adorns your right arm, and little bows decorate some thin strands of hanging hair.

"No! No! No!" Your fragile soft voice, only turns your protest into confirmation.

"What could have happened?" You then remember the candy and jump for the fallen jar sitting on the floor. The note is still attached but reads 'These are magic candies that will grant your every wish. Happy 11th!'

"11th? I'm 11 years old?" You brush it off and sit the jar up. "Doesn't matter, I'll just fix this."

You snatch a candy from the jar and pop it into your mouth, you devour it like it was your first meal in weeks, and then quickly yell, "I wish I was a 15 year old boy again!" You sit and wait. One minute goes by, then two, then five. It didn't work. You grab another candy "I don't want to be a little girl!" Again, there is no effect.

"What is wrong with these things? They must be what changed me!" You begin to inspect the jar, but it is just featureless clear plastic. Then you happen to spot the overturned lid, there is writing on it. You grab the lid and read, eventually finding what you were looking for.

"These candies are intended for the recipient, however they may be used by anyone. Before one can make a wish, wishes by all other uses must be canceled."

Your sister, she was eating a piece of candy before. You instantly close the jar and stand up. You barge out of the room and call to Sonia.

"Sonia! Where are you?"
121112122.title: Sonia unknowingly makes a wish

choices: Go wait by the front window
1211121222.content:
You practically leap down the stairs despite your much smaller new legs. With your great speed, your notably lengthened hair looks more like a ribbon flowing in the wind, it's a wonder that you don't trip.

"Sonia? Did you hear me?"

You're not getting an answer, and it becomes frustrating quickly. She was just down here not fifteen minutes ago, but now you can't find your sister.

There is hardly a sound around you as you stand in the middle of the dining room, clutching the candy jar with both hands, still unaccustomed to your skirt, and your body even more so. The walls around you suddenly have an eerily sterile look, as if everything is too still. Even the shadows of the trees standing outside have ceased their usual dance in the wind. Through your feet, you cannot feel the slight vibration of the floor that should come from the movement of everyone else in the house. All your senses are empty. You feel like you are the last person on Earth. A heaviness invades your legs; under the weight of all the stress that so quickly fell upon you, they feel even thinner, you are certain they are just about to give way.

"Rena? Were you calling for Sonia?"

A jolt ran up your spine with the quickness of lightning as those words entered your ears, however the concerned voice also shattered the specter of despair which had been gripping you so tightly. With a rapid turn, you see the face of your mother. Her expression tells you that she senses that something is wrong, you know that she can somehow sense your pain. Her perception is not something unique to the strange world where you are "Rena", your mother has always been one able to understand. For a moment, you feel that everything is right again. Accompanying that feeling, a simple revelation surfaces from the depths of your mind; you have never seen anything as comforting as your mother's face.

"Is something wrong? You look like you're about to cry."

She begins to come over to you, but you step back, now a little closer to calm.

"No, you just surprised me. I'm fine, mom."

You feel that she probably doesn't believe you, but you know she won't pry if you don't want to talk about it yet.

"Mom, where is Sonia?"

"She went out to get some last minute things for your party. She'll be back soon."

Your mom came closer again.

"Did you need something Rena?"

You briefly look away, then tell her the only thing that you can come up with.

"No, I just want to tell her something."

Mom comes up to you, bends down a little and gives you a reassuring hug.

"OK, I'll make sure that she finds you as soon as she comes in. Just make sure you enjoy today alright?"

You are a little stunned at her approach, but soon find yourself hugging back.

"Thanks mom." You say, before the two of you separate and go on your ways, when you quietly whisper those words again in gratitude for what you were truly thankful for.

In your boredom, you catch yourself twirling your hair around your fingers. You find the act a little embarrassing even though no one is watching, and quickly drop your hand to your side. While on the floor, you notice that something looked familiar about the girl, her short sandy hair and blue eyes made you think of someone else, though you can't pin down who.

All of your thoughts are scrambled by the sound of the doorbell ringing.

"I'll get it."

Your hear your mom come down and answer the door through the front hallway, then the lock, then the door.

"Daina?" You ask yourself. You think for a minute before your mind lights up. Daina's face looked like David's, your best friend.

"Could the candy have changed other people?"

As you stand up, you realize that your question would soon be answered. Not 15 feet away stands Daina, waving and wearing a great smile. Naturally, you're not sure of what to do, you try not to be the initiator and just wave back attempting to mask your uneasiness with a smile of your own.

1241.content:
You are getting ready for your 15th birthday party. All your friends would be on their way in a few hours, and it was going to be a blast. You started this tradition three years ago when you turned 12. Everyone came over, went wild, had cake, then ruined the front yard with silly-string fights. It was a hit, and your friends looked forward to it as much as you did every year.

You are waiting out the morning in your room, watching TV. You're only doing it to pass the time, so you're just exploring random channels and only half paying attention. As your eyes drift from the TV, you spot something on the floor. Out of boredom, you lean out of your bed to examine it. Laying on the floor is a small circular disk, made out of silvery metal. It looks like something one would wear on a necklace. You roll off the bed and pick it up. It's cold and a little heavy for its size. While spinning it around in your hand, you see that there is a gap running around the edge, it looks like it can be opened. With a little effort, the halves part and turn about a common hinge. On the inside, there is some writing.

"What?"

The letters seems backwards and scrambled, after a few seconds, you give up trying to decipher them. You turn the object again, and see that the other half contains a mirror.

"Ah, maybe I can read it with this!"

You try to reflect the words on the mirror, but it seems impossible, again you lose interest fast, and merely toss the now closed mirror up and down. When you finally become bored with it, you decide flip it open one last time before putting it away somewhere. You happen to catch a reflection in the mirror. At first, the face looks familiar, a little like yours. However, there are a few subtle differences. After looking more closely, it becomes apparent that it isn't your face at all, you're looking at a girl's face. You're surprised and turn to see if anyone is behind you. There is nothing but the wall to your room.

"That was odd." You say to yourself, but, you're voice didn't sound quite right.

"Hmmm? A-aaaaaaaaah!" You say as you test your voice. It's high and soft.

"What the?" You jump out of bed, but the landing is a little shaky. As you walk to the bathroom to see what's wrong, you find that your balance is off. You bend down to look down at your legs. In place of your white socks and black pajama pants, you see tiny bare feet with painted nails and thin yellow pants partially covered by what looks like a nightgown.

"I wasn't wearing this." You hurry to the bathroom and look at yourself in the mirror. The same girl from the pocket mirror is reflected back.

Without a word, you re-examine your body. You reach for one of the ponytails on the girl's head, and you can indeed feel it, what's more, you can feel the tugging of your hand through your hair, which seems much longer. You look down at your body, however something is blocking your vision this time. The gown you are wearing in place of your shirt is being pushed up from underneath. You press down on the raised fabric, but this causes you to feel a dull pain.

"Ah! What?"

You rub the spot on your chest that you hit, and find it to be very soft. You also feel a strange ticklish sensation due to the rubbing of your hand. At this point, you finally realize what it might be.

"It can't."

You pull the gown over your head and drop it to the ground. Looking down, you see your two modest breasts held in a lavender bra.

You're on the verge of screaming, but no sound comes from your mouth. Without even being sure of what to do, you suddenly run back to your room and close the door. Still trying to deny your newly discovered form, you lightly push on the breasts again. To your dismay, every inch of your hands is felt through your expanded and sensitive chest. You look away from your now female body and spot the pocket mirror sitting on your bed. It was the cause of this, you knew it had to be, and you quickly rushed to pick it up. You yank it open and look in the mirror. For the third time, you find yourself a cute brunette with twin pony tails and a soft, round face. The only keepsake from your time as a male are your shocked blue eyes.

"Turn me back!"

Your voice belays your feelings, as it hardly sounds threatening or serious. Unsurprisingly, the mirror does nothing. However, the words on the other half have somehow rearranged. With haste, you read them hoping to find a way to return to normal.

"This mirror is like no other, it reflects not only light, but reality itself. Be warned, to look up it is to reverse the very nature of the world. The mirror itself will be changed along with it. If you seek to undo this reflection, find the mirror's reflection; its peculiar and genuine twin."

The words mean nothing to you except that, you are sure that it is the cause of your troubles. You feel like smashing it, but hesitate, you fear being trapped as a girl for all time. Just as you reach the peak of sadness, you become calm. New information enters your mind. You are now Rena Turner, as you have always been. You're a girl celebrating her 15th birthday with all her friends from school. It's just an ordinary day. Yet at the same time, you recall the life of Raven Turner. You hold all of his memories as if they were your own, and in particular, you know that you should be him.

These odd thoughts leave you confused. One side of you feels like everything is normal, the other is in a panic. You feel that you should at least investigate your worries, especially the mysterious mirror you found this morning, but you also think about what say it is, everyone will be here and the focus will be on you. Even if you wanted to get away and see which side of you was right, it would be tough. In the end, you make up your mind.

1311322222222221222221.content:
You were watching bleach one day when your tv's reception began going bad, so you tuned it back till you could see the screen. You were watching the episode where Uryuu supposidly battled that privaron espada. The scenes, however did not look familiar. The battle began to seem almost real like you could feel it in your room, when the lights in your house went out and you looked away from your television. As soon as you had done that, you were sucked into their world. You looked around, and everything looked like anime, but somehow real.

You tried to get Uryuu's attention, but he didn't notice you. Almost as if you were invisible to them. You then looked down at yourself and noticed that you were a see-through, anime version of you. While you were distracted, Uryuu knocked the former espada Chirucchi back, throwing her right in your direction. You look up, but it's too late to move. You figure, "Oh well, she'll probably just go right through me anyway..", but you were wrong. She started going right through you, but the next thing you know, you hit the ground behind where you were standing, and you felt somehow.. lighter. You look up and around you for the female espada, and unable to find her, decide to look at where Uryuu is looking. He is staring right at you, and before you know it, he fires some arrows right at you.

You figure that you'd be unable to dodge it, but you try to move anyway. When you look up you realize that you really did dodge it to your surprise, and somehow managed to get all the way to the other side of the room. You then say "Wha- you can see me?" but then stop and cover your mouth in shock. Your voice is completely different. It's all high pitched and feminine. You look down and see that you have a small feminine figure, and your dressed in some strange style of outfit. Every bit of you is extremely girly. You then realise that you are in the body of Chirucchi.

Uryuu looks at you confused and says "what the hell is wrong with you? You seem a to be a bit displayced." You reply "I don't know how, but somehow I got trapped in this woman's body." He then says "Oh, so you're trying to trick me? It's not going to work, I'm smarter than that"

He proceeds to shoot arrows at you when you reflexively use your disk weapon to deflect them and knock him down. For some reason, you were becomming increasingly angry, and you started attacking him as some kind of retaliation.
He then disappears and reappears behind you with another energy arrow drawn back, but you knock him out of the air with the disk and throw it down on top of him when he hits the ground.
1311322222222221222221.title: Chirruchi Thunderwitch

As Raven gets up from his slumber, he sits on the edge of the bed and raises his arms up above his head and yawns to get himself fully waken up. And like everyone else after waking up, he finds that he has to use the restroom.

On his way there, his grogginess causes him to fail to realize that his normally short brown hair is now a dirty blonde color and down to his chin in length.

He stands up to relieve himself although little does he know that this is the last time he's ever going to do it like that. When he's done, he makes sure to flush the toilet and wash his hands since he's going to go eat.

On his way down he notices that there seems to be an empty room. 'I wonder what that's for.' he thinks to himself as he sits down at the dinner table.

"Thank you so much Raven, it's always nice to hear that my work is appriciated." she says as she serves everybody their helping of the meal.

Once she's done with that, she puts what's left back on the stove and sits down with her children. "It's so nice to be able to get away from everything and just relax. Don't you agree?" she asks and everyone at the table nods their head.

During the meal they all discuss what they would like to do for the time on their vacation. The girls want to go shopping of course but Raven finds himself in the middle on that issue.

What he doesn't realize is that his likes and dislikes are starting to change as before you would have to drag him kicking and screaming into a clothing store.

Once they were all done eating, Laura gathered up all of the dishes and placed them in the sink to begin washing them when something she didn't expect happened. "Hey mom, let me clean those for you." Raven offers.

Laura smiles as she can't believe that her son is being this helpful. "Why thank you Raven how nice of you." she says as she and Sonia decide to go in the living room and watch a movie while Nate cleans up.

Raven then gets started on doing the dishes, first filling up one of the sinks with hot soapy water and then filling the other one up with clean hot water for rinsing the dish detergent off.

He finds himself humming as he scrubs the dirty dishes of all their grime and filth and with each one that he scrubs, he puts into the clean water to rinse it off and then onto a rack to dry.

While he's doing this, he doesn't notice how he loses a few inches of height, leaving him at a very modest, yet decent 5'4".

And when he's done with all the dishes, he makes sure to drain the water and clean the sinks out so that their ready for the next usage. And when he's done with that, he dries his hands off to go join his mom and sister watching TV.

Sonia is the first to speak up. "Oh just one of those Twilight movies. Something you wouldn't like." she coldly responds which makes Raven turn his head away.

But then he decides to go ahead and watch it anyway and for some inexplicable reason, he finds himself actually enjoying watching it and also feels that he can relate to Bella in a way.

While the continue to watch, Raven's age jumps up just a bit to 18 years old.

Raven continues to watch the movie with his mother and sister and eventually finds himself really getting into it and enjoying it. 'Wow and I never thought I'd actually like this movie.' he thinks to himself.

Finally the movie ends and Laura shuts the TV off. "Ok you two time for bed." she announces.

Sonia groans at this but Raven just takes it in stride. "Look at it this way sis, the sooner we go to bed, the sooner we can head out and get some shopping in." he says with a smile as his voice goes up a slight octave.

Sonia thinks about it for a moment and nods her head. Then both her and Raven head up to their respective rooms and turn in for the night.

That night Raven had dreams not unlike the ones he had when he was napping earlier that day although these were a little different than the ones he had before.

Unlike the last ones where he was a little girl, here it seemed like he was a teenage girl blossoming into womanhood. He dreamt that he was a cheerleader and standing on the sidelines of his high school's football stadium rallying the crowd with the rest of the squad.

That morning he woke up and shook his head trying to clear it of those thoughts. 'Must be this house getting to me or something.' he reasons to himself as he heads into the bathroom to start his day.

The first thing that Raven does is relieve himself of everything that had built up during the evening while he slept. He was too groggy to realize that he had sat down to pee or even wiped himself off like a woman would.

When he was done with that, he went to the counter to get his toothbrush ready and brushed his teeth. As he was doing this, his teeth became straight and pearly white and if he were to smile, it would look like it belonged to a movie star.

After that, he got a wet wash cloth and used it to clean his face off of any dirt or bacteria so that he'd have a smooth shiny face for when he went out that day.

He's about to take them off but then realizes they actually feel quite comfortable and decides to leave them on. The next thing he goes for is socks and as he slides them on his feet, he notices that they seem to be softer and go farther up his legs, stopping at his calves. Speaking of his legs, they had begun changing next as they became much longer compared to the rest of his body while the thighs and calves filled out with womanly flesh, giving him a pair of legs that would be the envy of any cheerleader or dancer.

Satisfied with how he looks in the dress, he decides that he's going to take it off for now but does he decide to buy it?

1511121212.content:
Marik Shurai had picked this particular beach to practice his art of magic casting.
He was only 27..but already was wanted by many organizations.

He had killed....stolen....lied....swindled...and did whatever else he had to do to get what he wanted.
The Committee of Magical Containment warned him that they would use whatever force necessary to stop him.
He laughed at their threat.

Now he was here.
He decided to practice his magic some before he had to leave.
Holding his hands to the sky, he chanted.

"Ma-lorom...imani..thundra...."
The sky drew dark and storms swirled around the tiny island.
The rain fell quickly and heavily and drenched everything nearby.
He smiled evilly.
He then noticed the car that arrived at the nearby house...and the drenched boy staring at him.

He scowled.
If there was one thing he hated...it was people seeing him work.
He hated them..he hated cute things...he hated...well..he hated almost everything...
He approached the scared lad.
Lightning flashed and the boy got a good look at him.

His eyes were a dark grey that lit up by the lightnings flash.
A scar ran down the left side of his face.
His hands wore some kind of jeweled gloves.
His blood red cloak and robe swayed in the fierce wind.

He stood in front of the lad.
"You have seen too much....i must finish you."

Marik detested that horrid woman, the one who is responsible for causing him to hate everything. That witch was nothing but a problem, and while he wouldn't kill her, he'd be more than happy to return the pain she had caused him in spades.

Lady Merhyn began to thrash..trying to escape.

"No..let me go....he deserves what is coming to him!"
"Trust me..I know.
But we cannot endanger the boy."

Marik exploded in laughter.
"Fools!
Stupid fools!
You should have finished me when you had the chance...
Now the boy is mine...and you shall soon see the true meaning of pain and terror."

Marik vanished and Sykes fell to the ground.
"Headmaster!"
"Forget about me...go back to CMC and get everyone ready..."
"For what?"
"For Marik..he's coming for us..."

choices: What (or who) is the orb a match for?
15111212122112.content:
Marik put on a good show, per usual. He had bought plenty of time to get revenge on the woman who had, in his perception, screwed him over. "Lady in White" he smirked to himself. "If they knew the truth about her, she'd be wearing red! "

The boy looked up and asked "What did she do to you?" Marik scoffed back "You're too young to understand such things, boy!" The boy replied "Maybe, but talking about things hel--" He was cut off when Marik started raving to himself. "I mean how dare SHE turn her back on ME! I was the best thing that ever happened to her, but did she appreciate the things I did?! NO!" He then threw a glass of green mist magically contained without a lid against a wall, shattering it and acidicly damaging the paint job. "I was the one who was always there for her, and she was on my mind all the time. She even made me think that I was good! Can you believe that?!" He directed the question at one of his dark magic clone minions who then shrugged, before having his heart torn from his chest by Marik (the minions don't die, they just remain unconscious until other minions put them back together). "She only thought about me when I was around, and even then her thoughts were about loving him.
And what was with her rampant insincerity?! 'I love you so much! You're my closest friend! I worry about you all the time!'" He quoted, mocking her voice. He then looked to his hand, and remembered the still-warm heart in it, and tossed it in the garbage bin. "Merhyn is a liar, how DARE she judge me as evil, when she plays with the hearts of men and wizard alike!"
The boy perked up and said "Ah, so you have severe anger issues about her rejecting you for some dreamy guy who probably has a lot more talent than you?"

Marik looked very angry for a second, clenching his fist sending out black electricity from them, but then opened his hands, calming his energy. He looked back at the boy and smiled wickedly "And for that, my boy, he payed dearly." The boy for a split second, saw the image of Sykes, the worn out old wizard in his mind. "That's right, he may have retained his significant powers, but his 'dreaminess' as you called it, was obliterated."

"Does she still love him?" The boy asked before a binding force sealed his mouth shut. "Hush, that's enough for now" Marik calmly said.

He then walked over to the boy, who had been strapped down to a table. Marik's eyes turned black and he extended his hand, and began repeating a sentence over and over, in an indistinguishable language. The boy looked up and began to panic when suddenly his eyes rolled back into his head and a white wispy energy flowed out of his mouth and into an orb that Marik had on a necklace.

The boy's body turned to stone, and from within the necklace screaming could be heard. "Well would you look at that! You're a perfect match! Hahahahahah! Ah Hah HahHahHah! HAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!" Marik evilly laughed, as lightening crashed in the distance.
15111212122112.title: Don't Disturb: Wretchedness At Work

151112121221121.content:
Marik laughed manically as the screaming within the necklace continued.
"What have you done to me?"
Marik smiled.
"You might not understand..but i will try to answer your question.
Your soul is now imprisoned inside the necklace.
Also, for some reason, your soul is enough to give the necklace the final bit of energy it needs."

"Needs?
Needs for what?"
Marik did not answer..but vanished in a cloud of black smoke.
The boy could see everything from inside the orb.

They were now on a massive mountaintop...the wind fiercely whipping around them.
"Why did you bring me here?"
"You will help me..more than you realize.
You are the final soul i need...to release Lord Heroshin."

Marik began laughing again.
The boy was confused.
"Who is Lord Heroshin?"
"A demon of untold strength and power.
He despises anything that represents good and justice.
I will accompany him as he destroys this pathetic world...hahahaha!"

Marik Shurai gazes into the sky...and begins muttering the same language he used to take the boys soul.
Dark clouds cover the sky...lightning flashes repeatedly.
The orb glows brightly and all the captured souls fly into the sky.
As he finished the incantation, he smiled as a massive roar split the dark clouds.

"Lord Heroshin...is now free!"
151112121221121.title: a truely terrifying force

15332.content:
You found yourself absolutely stone bored. It was just a few minutes before lunch, always the worst part of the day. You were hungry, and had no desire what so ever to pay attention to the lesson. You weren't even sure what class you were in anymore. Just a few days before, you had gone crazy celebrating your birthday. Turning 15 was a huge deal, You had crossed halfway through your teenage years (or almost since being a teenager starts at 13, but going by 5's is easier) and set right on course for glorious manhood. You could almost feel the wild beard and bulging muscle hiding somewhere within you (although they both hidden a little too well, there was nothing to see). Despite all the enthusiasm and pride you had gained, sitting in the class room as you were - half conscious of the random tapping of chalk against slate and ready to fall asleep - made you feel more like you had actually turned 150. With one last spurt of energy, you throw your eyes on the clock once more. Two minutes, and the hands were only sweeping one second at a time. Your head goes down, your eyes close. There's no fighting it, you'll just have to hope that the teacher doesn't notice.

A sudden scream snaps you to attention, you look around trying to see who it is. The rest of the class is merely getting up slowly. It was actually the bell. You're free to go to lunch. After unwinding with a stretch, you push yourself from your small wooden desk and stand. Merging into the crowd of students, you head for the door and then proceed to fight against the current of bodies out in the hall. It's always the last challenge before lunch, since half of the school goes down to the cafeteria at the same time. People go about in all direction, tumbling into the turbulent river of the hall from numerous doors, and it tends to create chaos. There is a way around it however. Some time ago, you learned of an old stairway down at one corner of the school that no one seems to ever take. You would also use it when you didn't want to deal with the usual lunch time crowd, and after pushing your way through the main hall, you come to one of the school's quieter wings and head straight for the stairwell.

The door needs a good push, it's heavy and the hinges don't seem to be well kept. Today is worse than usual though, you end up bouncing off the door when you try to lean on it as usual. Oh well, you give a quick sigh and take your hands from your pockets and push. At first it still won't budge, but you eventually convince it to move.

"Stupid door."

However, when you manage to open it all the way, you here a click, as if something has come loose. After walking in, you turn around and look at the air piston on top of the door concerned that it might have broke. Luckily it seems intact, but then you notice a small wire with a silver ring on the end hanging from the piston. You've never noticed it before, and it doesn't even look like it's part of the door, but you'd rather not get in trouble for causing any damage.

"Well, no one saw me right?"

You look around talking to yourself, the coast is clear and you decided to just play dumb and head down to the cafeteria. Under gas starts shooting up from the ground. The air suddenly feels thicker and you begin cough and stumble back.

"What is this?"

All at once, you feel very tired, even more tired than you were in the class room. Your vision fades, and finally everything goes blank.

This time, it's not a sound that wakes you, but a flickering light. You pull a hand over your face to cover your eyes which are not yet adjusted. When you're able to see again, you notice that your surroundings have changed to a great degree. Instead of the bright, large halls of the school, you see only dull metal walls and a gray floor. You put your hand on top of your head, trying to rub away the dizziness. You can't really remember how you get here, and began reliving the day through your memories. At the same time, you tour the room with your sight while still laying on the bed, or whatever it was that you were laying on. That's when you get your first real shock.

The wall on your side is actually a mirror. You look into it and see yourself resting on some kind of long pedestal. You look just like you feel, but when you look below your face, you put on an even worse look. In the mirror, you see that you are wearing a girl's uniform - a blouse, skirt, stockings, and slip on shoes. At this sight, you instantly jump up from the bed. The mirror still mimics you, and you see a 15 year old boy staring back in what is certainly a girl's uniform. You want to look down and see for yourself if this is some kind of trick or not, but your actually scared to find that it's actually real. Instead, you step down from your seat and make your way over to the mirror. Just about a foot from it, reach towards the reflective surface with your hand, but your suddenly stopped by a strange feeling.

You drag your arms back to you body and wrap them around your stomach. Something is happening inside you, every part of your body is sending you the weirdest signals. You can't even comprehend the feeling, the only way to describe it is, not right. Standing becomes difficult, as your legs feel weak and shaky. You bring yourself down to the floor, but your body finds no comfort. Then, everything concentrates itself in your arms. They twitch out of your control in front of you. With great fear, you only look on as they actually begin to change shape. At first, they seem to be withering, they get thinner and a little shorter. Your hands and fingers look much smaller especially. But then, your arms take on a nice shape, your skin begins to look extremely smooth, and your hands look healthier, as if they have never been used. The feeling quickly shifts to your legs, and they begin a very similar transformation. This time, you watch through the mirror your legs become smaller and more delicate just like your arms, your body looks much more natural in the skirt and blouse than it did a few moments ago, and seems to desire continued adaptation. The feeling races to your head, and you become immensely dizzy. You fall over, and are unable to view what happens to you until it is complete. As the feeling once again shifts, you slowly get up. The face in the mirror is foreign, a strange girl with long, flowing, shining hair is staring with her mouth hanging open in shock, it is you. The final changes begin, you torso rearranges and takes on a feminine shape, and finally your chest heaves as two breasts push their way up under your shirt.

In the mirror across form you, there is no trace of your body. There is only a girl, the same age as you, sitting on the floor in a state of grave confusion.

15511212.content: "I wonder where Sonia is" you say and you start looking for her. Eventually, you find her in her room. "Hello sis. Good mourning" you say. She turns to you and says, "Good mourning. Happy Birthday brother!". "Thanks" you respond. "So, what are you up to?" you ask. "Not much" she responds. "Well ok then" you say and turn to leave. "Wait!" she suddenly says and walks up to you. "What is it?" you ask.
15511212.title: Sonia, your sister

155112121.content: "Come with me. I want to show you something" she says. "Ok" you respond. She grabs your hand and starts pulling you along. You really wonder what is up with Sonia. "Are you ok Sonia?" you ask. "I'm fine just come on" she responds. Eventually, she pulls you outside and brings you to a more secluded part of your backyard. Suddenly, Sonia stops. "What is it?" you ask. "There" she says and points forward. You look forward to see.....
155112121.title: she wants you to come with her

1551121211.content: ...some of the strangest looking fruit you have ever seen. "What in the world?" you say. "I just found these yesterday. I thought I should tell you" says Sonia. There were a few of many strange kinds. There was a blue, scalish one and one that looked like flower petals among others. "You want to try one brother?" asks Sonia. "Isn't that somewhat dangerous? We don't even know if these are edible" you say. "Actually, I tried a bit of one already and it's just like regular fruit so try one" Sonia insists. "Well, when you put it that way" you say deciding that it couldn't hurt. You look at the fruits and choose the....
1551121211.title: strange fruit

15511212111.content:
...the blue, scaly fruit. You pick it up and take a small bite. "It tastes really fishy" you say. "That explains the scales then" says Sonia. Since it actually tasted good, you finish it. "Well, that was delicious. Thanks sis" you say and walk away.

Meanwhile, Sonia starts wondering, "I wonder if this was a good idea. All well, there's no going back now. At least, I won't be alone now".

Back inside, the party starts and continues on for a couple hours. Eventually, it ends and everyone goes home. You and Sonia finish up dinner and decide to go to bed. You put on your pajamas and go to sleep.
15511212111.title: blue, Fish fruit

155112121111.content:
As much as you thought that something wierd would soon happen, nothing ever did. The day and night passed by peacefully with no disturbances. However, you did notice Sonia not being as energetic as usual. You figured that perhaps she just had something on her mind.

Anyway, the next day came quickly.

Your parents were out doing something for the day, so you had to come up with something else to do.

"Maybe Sonia and I can go somewhere" you pondered to yourself.

Where do you decide to go to?
155112121111.title: nothing happens that night

1551121211111.content:
"Hmm, that sounds good" you smiled to yourself. With that, you ran upstairs to tell Sonia. After all, you could drive you both down there.

"Sonia, how about we go to Disney World today? We can head down to that Epcot place you like" you said with a smile. Sonia looked at you and smiled a bit.

"Sure, that sounds fun" she says as you leave to get yourself ready. She sighs to herself.

"So, I guess this will be the last time I'll see this room" she muttered to herself.

*****Few minutes later*****

Soon enough, you were dressed and ready to go. Sonia was ready as well.

"Ok, let's go" you said and she followed. Long story short, you drove the both of you down there and paid for a couple of tickets to get in. It took a while to get down there but you felt that it was worth it.

As much as you wanted to see other rides, you felt an urge to see the water exhibits there. Sonia agreed with you, and felt that it was a good idea. When you got over there, it was pretty cool seeing the wide variety of sealife there. For some reason, you felt like you could be in there for some reason.

"You like them?" asked Sonia, giving you a small smile. You looked back at her.

"Kind of. Anyway, you want to go get yourself something? I'lm going to take a look around" you said. Sonia nodded, although she had a slightly sad look on her face. You gave her an odd look but she insisted that she was fine.

"It'll be very short now" said Sonia as you walked away.
1551121211111.title: Disney World

155112121112.content:
That night, you were expecting a peaceful sleep. Instead, you got something really wierd.

It was hard to tell what was going on but you felt something strange. It was like you were underwater but you could breathe easily. That was really all that happened, just a lot of water, like an ocean.

Eventually, you woke up the next mourning. "That was very strange" you said. In fact, it was the strangest dream you've ever had. You were surprised that you never needed to use the bathroom during the night. Anyway, you got up, put clean clothes on, and went downstairs.

Is it a school day or weekend?
155112121112.title: really strange dream

choices: go to the pool in the backyard
1551121211122.content:
Thankfully, it was the weekend so you didn't have to go to school. You walked down to the dining room to see Sonia there. "Mourning sis. Where's mom?" you ask. She looks at you and says, "She has errands to run. She won't be back until late tonight". You nod and get yourself some breakfast. "Hey Raven, are you ok?" she asks. "Nothing. Just a wierd dream is all" you respond. This interested Sonia, "What was the dream?" You explained to her what happened. "That was it. Nothing but a lot of water" you say. What you didn't know was that Sonia had the same dream. What did it mean?

"Well anyway, since it is just the two of us, do you want to do something together?" you ask her. "Sure" she responds. "Where do you want to go?" you ask. Sonia thinks for a second and responds, "How about we....
1551121211122.title: weekend

15511212111222.content:
...go use the pool in the backyard?" she suggests. That sounds good to you. "Sure!" you respond. "Ok, meet me at the back door in 10 minutes" says Sonia and she runs up to her room. You go your own room and grab some things like sunscreen, towel, and googles. You also get your navy blue swimtrunks and put them on. "It's been a while since I have used the pool" you say to yourself as you grab your stuff and go downstairs.

You wait at the back door for a few minutes. Eventually, Sonia comes down carrying her own stuff and wearing a pink one-piece. "You ready brother?" she asks and you nod. "Great, lets go!" she says and both of you go to the backyard.
15511212111222.title: go to the pool in the backyard

155112121112221.content:
You both go to the pool and set up your stuff. "Hey Raven, could you put the lotion on me?" asks Sonia. "Sure" you respond. Sonia lays down while you put the sunscreen on her. Once you are done, she returns the favor and does your sunblock. Then, you get ready to go in and, surprisingly, Sonia joins you. "Are you going in now as well? You usually just lay down for a while first before going in" you ask her. "True, but today I just want to get in there" she responds and you nod your head. You go ahead and jump right into the water while Sonia takes a slower path into the water.

For some reason, as you swim back to the surface, you really like being under the water. It feels just right under there. "Sonia, you gotta go under. It's great!" you tell her as she gets in. Then, she goes under as well. The two of you spend quite a long time being underwater. Both of you enjoy it so much. Eventually, you both take a break and just sit on some steps leading into the pool. As you sat, only your legs were underwater. "Hey Raven, have you been shaving more?" asks Sonia. "Why do you ask?" you respond. "Well, it looks like there is less hair on you, especially your chest" she says. You look down to see that she is right. You didn't have alot of chest hair to begin with but it looked like there was less than usual. You also saw that your arms and armpits had less hair as well. "Your right. I wonder why?" you ask. Sonia says, "Don't worry about it. I think you look just as fine without it. Who needs hair everywhere anyway?". You have to admit that you agree with that.

You also saw something interesting. "By the way Sonia, I think you need a new swimsuit. Yours is ripping in some areas" you say. Indeed, Sonia's one-piece swimsuit looked a bit ripped. There was a single rip line around the bottom of her suit where her hips were and there was another similar rip going around just under her breast area. If those rips completely circled her body, she'd look like she was wearing a bikini. "I know. I'll get a new one sometime" she responds. Eventually, you two resume swimming and having fun. You two splash each other and do all sorts of things.

The hours pass by and eventually the afternoon comes. "All right Sonia, I think it's about time to get out" you say and look back. You are surprised at what you see.
155112121112221.title: continue

1551121211122211.content:
Sonia's one-piece had ripped apart at the places where you saw them before. They ripped exactly how you through they would as well. It was the middle part of her suit that ripped off leaving just the parts covering her breasts and bottom. She looked like she was wearing a bikini. "I guess it couldn't take anymore" you say. You also notice something odd. The other parts should have fallen off as well but they didn't. In fact, it looks like they tightened on her skin, really making it look like a bikini. You just shake off the thought. "You know, this doesn't look too bad on me. What do you think?" she asks. She actually looked good in a bikini for a 13-year old. "Great" you respond and she smiles. Then, she says, "Looks like the pool discolored your trunks a bit". You look down to see that she is right. Your navy blue trunks looked a bit paler than usual. It almost looked like a bright blue. "All well, it doesn't really matter. Let's go in brother" says Sonia and you follow her inside.

Inside your room, you are about to take off your swimtrunks when you start thinking that you like the feel of them on. They're not really that much different from your boxers. You decide to leave them on.

Meanwhile, Sonia was also deciding to leave her torn swimsuit on, which somehow had changed to become an actual bikini. She, of course, knew what was happening. "I wonder how long it'll be until it happens. Well, I'm glad Raven will be with me" she says to herself with a sad face. She keeps her new pink bikini on under her clothes and leaves her room.

The two of you have some lunch together and start planning what to do next.
1551121211122211.title: Sonia's swimsuit ripped apart

15511212111222111.content:
The two of you decide to watch a movie together. You both go to the family room and sit on the couch. You start flipping through the channels. Eventually, the two of you come across a movie you both have never seen before. It was about oceans. For some reason, you couldn't tear your attention away from it. Sonia felt the exact same way.

The movie went on for about an hour. Throughout the movie, for some odd reason, you could almost see yourself swimming along with the animals. You immediately snapped out of it. "Gee, I must have water on the brain" you think to yourself. Following the movie, you looked at Sonia. "Hey Sonia, did you get bigger?" you asked. Suddenly, it looked lke Sonia was nearly at eye-level with you. "Either that or you got smaller" she replies. It was true, you did look smaller than usual. "Is there something wrong with me?" you ask. "I think you're fine.You just need to stop thinking about it" says Sonia. You agree with her.

The rest of the day passed with nothing much happening. That night, you both went to bed.
15511212111222111.title: watch TV

155112121112221111.content:
A week passed and the weekend came again. It was a rather uneventful week. Every night, you would see that same exact dream. You weren't any closer to finding out what it meant. Anyway, you noticed some other things. Sonia was eye-level with you now and it was because you were shorter. Not only that, now all your body hair was completely gone. Chest, armpits, arms, legs, all of that was gone. Not only that, your skin felt smoother than usual. "That must be from all the swimming" you say. Now, you and Sonia couldn't resist swimming every day. You two swam together all the time. You two also continued to wear your swimwear all the time. It felt better than your boxers so you never took them off. Another thing was that your swimtrunks were now completely a different color. The once navy blue color had paled to a bright sky blue color. You had no idea why but it wasn't that big a deal.

Also, it had been a while since your last haircut and it was really starting to grow. For some reason though, you didn't want to cut it. It was ear-length right now but that was much longer than you ever grew it before.

Anyway, you shook all that off and went to bed that night.
155112121112221111.title: A week later

1551121211122211111.content:
You went to bed expecting that same dream again. However, this time you were in for a surprise.

Once again, you saw nothing but lots and lots of water. However, this time, the person looked a bit different. It was almost like a cross between a girl and a boy. Face was still boyish but it had longer hair, longer fingernails, and budding breasts. It still had it's "thing" between it's legs however. It wore sky blue swimtrunks but now they had shrunken, nearly resembling a bikini. This time, the person was playing with some fish. It was almost like it could communicate with them. It just continued to play with them.

You decide that there is no time like the present so you decide that it'd be best to just start screaming. You try to cry out, but no sound is made. You try your hardest scream, but no air comes in or out. That's when you realize "Shit! I've got no mouth!" You try to reach your hands up to feel your mouth, but the tips of your fingers are projecting roots and branches, and are now rooted to the ground. Your legs have now fused together, and your entire body is now mostly wood.

You see your family members coming outside to explore the yard, looking cheerful as usual, exploring their new house. Your little sister Sonia is taking the lead, way ahead of your mother and her friend Mia. You hear them talking about something interesting in the back yard.

Sonia: "Yeah, I found this tree full of orange fruits! Enough for the whole neighborhood!!"
Laura: "So that's what's with the status you posted inviting all of your friends over here? This must be some fruit"
Mia: "I'm texting your friend Janice to come over, I'm sure she'll want some too, if this fruit like, totally good."
Sonia: "Yeah, even Sophia and David are coming over for our housewarming party in a few moments. This will be good."
Laura: Sighing "Alright, you girls. I suppose I'll try some"

Soon, people started coming into the yard. You watched in horror as your friends and family, per Sonia's lead, began picking fruits off and biting into them. The tree just sat there, mocking you, you being unable to even turn your head.
Sonia is the first to be affected. Her shoes begin getting torn open by her own roots, connecting her to the ground. "What's happening?" She said. There was nothing you could do as you watched, while a few tears ran down your bark, as your eyes disappeared.

The last conscious thought you had was of how you were sad for your friends and family, panicking as they turned into trees, unable to stop the transformation. But before you faded to black, you felt at peace. The sunlight comforted you, and now that's all you'd have for the rest of your life.

"All right, I guess I'll go" you finally said. Sonia came up and hugged you.

"Yay, I don't have to go alone!" she cried out, looking as happy as ever. You weren't entirely sure though. This was a completely wacko situation. Who knows what would happen in the end. However, for now, Laura seemed happy as well.

"So glad to hear it. As you may already see, your things are packed already. You don't have to worry about the boy clothes in there. They can be changed as well" explained Laura. You were a little surprised at that, although not much.

"I do wish you could have told me earlier though. I could have at least had more time to think it over" you told them. Laura looked a little sad at that.

"I apologize, really. It's just that it all came together very recently. The semester starts in about a couple of days or so" explained Laura. You sighed again.

"All right, let's just go then" you said, wanting to get this over with. Laura and Sonia continued to smile.

"Don't worry Raven. Some things may change but you can have a great life like this. It'll be an improvment over your current grades" said Laura. You got a little mad at that, although a little amused too.

"Hey, I get good grades. Average, but still good" you reasoned, which made you all laugh a bit. Anyway, it was time to get going, as Laura said that the semester would start very soon.
1553322221112221.title: Agree and go

15533222211122211.content:
"By the way, where is this so-called Institute?" you asked Mom as the three of you walked through the airport.

"Well, there are actually multiple schools, about 4 of them throughout the country. I think all of them are in pretty remote locations. The closest one to us, and the one the two of you are headed to, is near Portland" explained Laura. You were a little surprised at that. All the way in Oregon?

"All the way there? Quite a distance" you said.

"Yeah, kind of. You'll be heading directly to Portland from here" Laura further explained. Eventually, they got to security, where they had to split up. Laura hugged you and Sonia one more time.

"Be good now. I'll miss you both" said Laura. Sonia nodded happily, while you slowly nodded. You still weren't sure about this.

"I still find it surprising that you have no problem having me become a girl" you said to Laura. She looked straight at you.

"It is a little wierd, but I think this is the best route for you. I hope it all works out for you" said Laura, before kissing you both again and leaving.

"Easy to say it" you said as you and Sonia went through security and made your way towards the gate. About half an hour later, you both were being boarded onto the plane set for Portland, Oregon. Sonia was excited.

"Isn't this fun?! I love planes!" she exclaimed. You smiled at her, as you liked planes too.

"Yeah. Should be fun" you said as you both found your seats and strapped yourselves in.

About 20 minutes later, you heard the safety protocalls and heard the plane revving up. Soon enough, the plane was on the runway and blasting off into the sky. Eventually, the plane settled, allowing for free movement.

"By the way Sonia, what do you think of all this? Do you not like me as your brother?" you asked, a little sad that your whole family was ok with this. Sonia looked at you, gave a small smile, and gave you an affectionate hug.

"Not at all. I like you Raven. I was surprised too when Mom said that you would go too. I like you no matter what you look like" she said. You smiled a bit at that.

"Thanks" you replied. Sonia's smile then got wider.

"Although, I do look forward to being able to talk to an older sister" she giggled. You shook your head in amusement as you ruffled her hair.

"Yeah, you keep telling yourself that" you grinned.

15533222222222222222.content:
Chapter 28: The Aphrodite Bridal Boutique and Salon.

In this story you are either John Anderson or Karina Anderson. The public face of the Aphrodite Bridal Boutique is a shop where women may purchase bridal, maid of honor, and bridesmaid dresses/gowns as well as get the primping that is necessary for such an occasion. The owner of the store is personal assistant Petra Romani an Eastern European woman who wears a stylish black blazer over a dark red dress. Very few people can get reservations because it is such a highly respected business with high quality gowns.

Now for the reality, Aphrodite Bridal Boutique is a front it servers multiple purposes. The main purpose being to transform women into dream wives before they are married. Their secondary purpose is also to transform men into dream women. Why do they do this? Because Petra Romani is an entrepreneur who knows how to keep business booming. Reservations cost a lot of money because their main source of revenue is giving people what they want... a beautiful blushing bride. They have expanded to many different sources of income in the past few years. They are especially proud of being able to turn men into anatomically correct women in various ways. The process typically has three components body transformation, mind manipulation, and dressing that occur in any order. Depending on the request of the "buyer" additional steps to lengthen or shorten the process as long as the end result is the desired woman.

What they typically do to women:
1. Brides to be who have been recommended here by the Groom will be reshaped to be the perfect woman in both mind and body.
2. "Maids" of Honor who have been recommended here by the Bride and/or Groom will be transformed into a perfect woman in order to become the happy couple's new live in maid.
3. Bridesmaids who were recommended by the Bride and/or Groom will be transformed into a harem that will be kept by the happy couple or given to the groomsmen as gifts.

What they typically do to men:
Note: Men typically are coerce into arriving at the boutique under the pretense of picking up something for the Bride.
1. Men who are asked to pick up the wedding dress are turned into Brides. This can be for various reasons ranging from the actual Bride needs a doppelganger to avoid marriage, the Bride wants to marry a woman instead of a man, the Groom wants to marry a friend/enemy transformed, etc...
2. The man who is asked to pick up the "Maid" of Honor's dress is turned into "Maids" of Honor. Like above they will be transformed to be the couple's ideal live in maid. The reason for this may be anything from the Maid of Honor dropped out to the Bride not having any close female friend.
3. Men who are asked to pick up bridesmaid dresses are turned into Bridesmaids. This may be due to a bridesmaid getting sick and an understudy being needed.

Anyone who comes alone without a reservation will be either turned into a bride to be sold off to a powerful male client or turned into an employee that will help transform other victims.

There are multiple ways of transformation ranging from magical jewelry, magical dresses, nano technology, gadgets, and anything that can be thought of. Petra Romani is always one for the dramatic.
15533222222222222222.title: A Special Story

info.brief_description: An iteractive story that will change your life. Now over 16,000 views.
info.description:
All right, my first interactive story!! Wahoo!! Basically, this story revolves around magical occurances in the world. The things that happen mostly include TG sequences. For example, body switching, magical items, revenge, etc. Please update! I don't want to do this by myself.

I'll keep track of all chapters and distribute gift points accordingly.

Note (2/27/2012): For anyone who is really interested in Candies of Change and enjoys it, I am currently planning to write a sequel to it. However, I'd like to involve others in trying to come up with ideas and concepts for the sequel. If you really enjoy Candies of Change and would like to help me with the next one, please feel free to contact me. Thank you for your time.

Also, if there are any of you that enjoy Fire Emblem, I'd like to get my Fire Emblem story going again. If you like that series and would like to help, contact me as well.

Here are the rules:

1. Keep it PG-13!
2. You can have sex, but not descriptive and try not to have too much.
3. Keep language PG-13 and also keep it tame (like not cursing every sentence)
4. Keep the story going and no killing the characters.


Here's the story:
